name: Mora and the End of the World
name_original: Mora and the End of the World
description:
Build your deck
  • Over 100 cards to draft
  • Weekly updates with new content
  • Discover new synergies
Defeat monsters
  • Complex enemy behavior
  • Transparent enemy intents allow for informed strategic decisions
  • Defeated enemies drop card rewards
  • Defeat the Void at the center of the world to win
Navigate an ever changing map
  • 5 terrain types
  • The Void swallows tiles removing them forever
  • New tiles enter from the edge of the map, bringing with them new enemies

This game is still very much in early access, so I am updating it frequently. Please playtest and give feedback so that I can make it as good as possible.
